name: mob'em all - drawing puzzle
description:
A huge crowd is closing in on you!
Draw a wall with lines to protect it. However, if the lines you draw collide with each other, the game is over.
Think carefully before you draw your lines.

EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
